data.name: 0000 (414.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: How'd it go? You didn't hear the piano while I was gone or anything?

data.name: 0001 (414.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: It's not like the school chime or anything--as if we'd hear it that easily.

data.name: 0002 (414.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: What's up with that? How boring.

data.name: 0003 (414.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I've done some thorough research--about the legend of the music room!

data.name: 0004 (414.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: A legend? There is such a thing?

data.name: 0005 (414.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Well, it wasn't written anywhere directly.

data.name: 0006 (414.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: When you cross-examine all the records, what happened is evidently clear.

data.name: 0007 (414.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Isn't that what you call a "setup"?

data.name: 0008 (414.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: You're so annoying. Just shut up and listen to me!

data.name: 0010 (414.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: A long time ago there was a student with enough musical talent to safely call a prodigy.

data.name: 0011 (414.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: She surely wasn't pleased with people fussing about their expectations for her future.

data.name: 0012 (414.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: But, she was struck by misfortune--

data.name: 0014 (414.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: An tragic incident stole music from her!

data.name: 0015 (414.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Look at Haruhi--getting invested in her own made-up story.

data.name: 0016 (414.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: After the incident, her body was no longer in a state to play the piano.

data.name: 0017 (414.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Thus, unable to participate in the piano contest she was aspiring to…

data.name: 0018 (414.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Filled with hopelessness and despair, she cast music away…

data.name: 0019 (414.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: She eventually gave up on even living.

data.name: 0020 (414.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: There was a piece of music she compose for a contest...

data.name: 0021 (414.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: However, due to her death, it was never finished.

data.name: 0022 (414.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Only one bar left…

data.name: 0023 (414.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: It seems as if since then, whenever it comes to her practice time...

data.name: 0024 (414.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: ...you can hear her music from the time coming from the music room.

data.name: 0025 (414.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Of course, without that one missing bar...

data.name: 0027 (414.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Waaaaah--Poor thing--!

data.name: 0028 (414.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Asahina, I get how you feel, but this was all just made up by Haruhi.

data.name: 0029 (414.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Apparently that sheet music remains in the music room to this day.

data.name: 0030 (414.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: What do you mean "apparently"? You just made this all up, right?

data.name: 0031 (414.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Didn't I say already? I cross-examined all the records.

data.name: 0032 (414.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: So, it's not entirely made up?

data.name: 0033 (414.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I'm lost for words…

data.name: 0034 (414.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Is this actually a true story?

data.name: 0035 (414.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Or something created by Haruhi's desires…

data.name: 0037 (414.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Maybe thinking the same thing, Koizumi and I met eyes as he formed a troubled expression.

data.name: 0038 (414.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: No need to give me that intense look--I get what you're trying to say.

data.name: 0039 (414.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: That it wouldn't be strange…

data.name: 0040 (414.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: ...if Haruhi's made-up story based on disorganized sources came true, right?

data.name: 0041 (414.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Either way, it'll all be clear once we've seen it with our own eyes!

data.name: 0042 (414.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Alright, let's go inside!

data.name: 0044 (414.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Even as a student, I very rarely step inside the music room.

data.name: 0045 (414.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Maybe thanks to the story we just heard from Haruhi, but the room felt eerie somehow.

data.name: 0046 (414.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: Wow, a huge piano.

data.name: 0047 (414.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: That's what you call a grand piano.

data.name: 0048 (414.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: Mikuru, play it, play it~

data.name: 0049 (414.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Huh? I-I'm no good...

data.name: 0050 (414.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Hey, don't bother Asahina too much.

data.name: 0051 (414.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: Grr~

data.name: 0054 (414.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Don't worry, little sis!

data.name: 0055 (414.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: The piano will start playing itself before long!

data.name: 0056 (414.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Haruhi said so while pointing at the clock.

data.name: 0057 (414.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Five minutes to two o'clock... huh.

data.name: 0058 (414.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Even if the piano really does play itself, that's an hour later at three o'clock.

data.name: 0059 (414.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: But we never told Haruhi the original time.

data.name: 0060 (414.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I wonder if she'll actually give up if the piano doesn't play when the time comes.

data.name: 0061 (414.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: If we wait here, it should start to play.

data.name: 0062 (414.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I'm so excited!

data.name: 0063 (414.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I wonder if the keys will move on their own, or if a ghost will appear and play them!

data.name: 0064 (414.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Nagato, just for peace of mind--is it safe for us to be here?

data.name: 0065 (414.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Safe?

data.name: 0066 (414.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Like, is the piano actually going to start playing?

data.name: 0067 (414.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: I cannot provide a definite response at the present.

data.name: 0068 (414.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: However, the probability is low.

data.name: 0069 (414.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: I'm unable to confirm the presence of any singularities or data lifeforms.

data.name: 0070 (414.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: This space is exceedingly regular.

data.name: 0071 (414.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I see…

data.name: 0072 (414.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I guess that means I can relax for the time being.

data.name: 0073 (414.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: There is something that concerns me.

data.name: 0074 (414.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Something that concerns you?

data.name: 0075 (414.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: What do you mean by that?

data.name: 0076 (414.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: In particular…

data.name: 0077 (414.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Hey, Kyon!

data.name: 0078 (414.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Stop muttering to each other in the corner like that! Come over here and watch the piano!

data.name: 0079 (414.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Isn't enough that you're camping out in front of it yourself?

data.name: 0080 (414.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: It's not! We need everyone watching! If we miss it, it's your fault, you know?!

data.name: 0081 (414.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Yeah, yeah.

data.name: 0088 (414.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: Hey Kyon, whatcha doing?

data.name: 0089 (414.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: God knows.

data.name: 0090 (414.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I've been wondering the same thing myself.

data.name: 0091 (414.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Hey, keep it quiet--you!

data.name: 0092 (414.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Yeah, yeah.

data.name: 0093 (414.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: …It's two o'clock now.

data.name: 0098 (414.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: Kyon, I'm bored.

data.name: 0099 (414.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Deal with it.

data.name: 0100 (414.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: …Five past two just passed.

data.name: 0102 (414.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Haruhi told us the time as if she were some kind of radio presenter.

data.name: 0107 (414.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: …So Haruhi, how long are you planning to keep up this unproductive act?

data.name: 0108 (414.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: Blehhh... I'm so bored...

data.name: 0109 (414.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Shall we have a chat together then?

data.name: 0111 (414.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: What the heck! It's not making any noise at all!

data.name: 0112 (414.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: What on earth is going on here!

data.name: 0113 (414.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Oi, calm down, Haruhi.

data.name: 0114 (414.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: How am I supposed to be calm?! Are you kidding?!

data.name: 0115 (414.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Directing her complaints at the piano, Haruhi seemed unable to suppress her anger.

data.name: 0116 (414.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Hey! What on earth is going on?!

data.name: 0117 (414.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I don't care if it's classical or pop or anything, just play something!

data.name: 0118 (414.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: If you don't, I'll smash you up until you're nothing but chips of wood!

data.name: 0119 (414.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: What exactly is she expecting to come out of threatening a piano?

data.name: 0120 (414.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Look, hey! Don't mess around with it like that!

data.name: 0121 (414.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: What're you gonna do if you mess up the tuning touching it in weird places?

data.name: 0122 (414.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I heard tuning a piano is a big deal and even costs a lot of money.

data.name: 0123 (414.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: …Hmph, I get it--okay?

data.name: 0124 (414.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Good grief--God knows what she'd end up doing if we left her on her own.

data.name: 0125 (414.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Since it's come to this, we're gonna find the sheet music I mentioned no matter what!

data.name: 0126 (414.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: You all need to help out!

data.name: 0127 (414.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Good grief…

data.name: 0128 (414.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I guess we just have to go along with Haruhi until she eventually accepts it.

data.name: 0129 (414.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: This is rather troubling indeed.

data.name: 0130 (414.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Hm... What is?

data.name: 0131 (414.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: The time.

data.name: 0132 (414.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I'm talking about how the abnormal event actually occurs at 3 PM.

data.name: 0133 (414.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: If we remain in the music room like this, we may actually hear the piano start to play.

data.name: 0134 (414.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: No way--Nagato said it was safe?

data.name: 0135 (414.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: At the time, Nagato was about to tell you something.

data.name: 0136 (414.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I myself am greatly interested in what that may have been.

data.name: 0137 (414.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: …Got it. Well, let's ask the person in question.

data.name: 0139 (414.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Nagato, there's something we wanna ask...

data.name: 0140 (414.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: What is it?

data.name: 0141 (414.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: You were about to say something earlier, right?

data.name: 0143 (414.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: What was it?

data.name: 0145 (414.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: If I recall correctly, you stated that there was something that concerns you.

data.name: 0146 (414.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: What concerns me--is this space.

data.name: 0147 (414.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: You said there weren't any problems, didn't you?

data.name: 0148 (414.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: The lack of problems is a problem.

data.name: 0149 (414.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: …If you wanna play a word game, do it with Haruhi instead...

data.name: 0150 (414.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: At the present, the data links throughout the school are destabilizing more than usual.

data.name: 0151 (414.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: You've said that before.

data.name: 0152 (414.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: And thanks to that--the data lifeforms or whatever are gathering here, right?

data.name: 0153 (414.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: But you said this music room is as normal, and nothing strange seems likely to happen.

data.name: 0154 (414.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: The expression "as normal" is not correct.

data.name: 0155 (414.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: What...?

data.name: 0156 (414.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: The data links are stable, so there's no margin for other data to intervene.

data.name: 0157 (414.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: This space is too clean.

data.name: 0158 (414.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Too... clean?

data.name: 0161 (414.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Hey, you three.

data.name: 0162 (414.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I'm heading back to the clubroom.

data.name: 0163 (414.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Wh-what's wrong--all of a sudden?

data.name: 0164 (414.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I'm gonna check the sources once more.

data.name: 0165 (414.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I'll ask the Computer Society while I'm at it.

data.name: 0166 (414.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: We're never gonna reach a conclusion at this rate.

data.name: 0167 (414.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: Ah, wait for me, Haru-nyan.

data.name: 0168 (414.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: H-hey, Haruhi!

data.name: 0169 (414.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Haruhi opened the door and headed out of the music room, showing no signs of stopping.

data.name: 0170 (414.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: My little sister tagged along with her.

data.name: 0171 (414.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Good grief... I want to think about this a little before we take any action.

data.name: 0172 (414.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: It seems Miss Suzumiya's mental condition is less than favorable.

data.name: 0173 (414.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Your ESP allows you to understand Haruhi's mood?

data.name: 0174 (414.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: It's not ESP, it's just my personal opinion.

data.name: 0175 (414.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: You must be paying very close attention to her.

data.name: 0176 (414.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: However, I do believe we are rather fortunate that Haruhi left the music room...

data.name: 0177 (414.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: ...of her own volition.

data.name: 0178 (414.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: What Nagato said weighs greatly on my mind as well.

data.name: 0179 (414.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I suggest we leave here at once.

data.name: 0180 (414.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I agree with you on that.

data.name: 0181 (414.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: We managed to trick Haruhi. I don't care what happens next.

data.name: 0182 (414.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: In that case, there's one matter we must attend to first.

data.name: 0183 (414.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Something we have to attend to? What's that?

data.name: 0184 (414.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Tidying this room up.

data.name: 0185 (414.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: How's it going? Did you find the sheet music?

data.name: 0186 (414.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: No, not yet.

data.name: 0187 (414.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Then stop chatting and search properly!

data.name: 0188 (414.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: …I'm not gonna ask twice, okay?

data.name: 0189 (414.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Ugh…

data.name: 0190 (414.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I'll keep searching.

data.name: 0191 (414.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: You do that.

data.name: 0192 (414.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Kyon, have you found anything?

data.name: 0193 (414.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: No, nothing.

data.name: 0194 (414.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: You don't need to look so worried...

data.name: 0195 (414.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It's not your responsibility, Asahina.

data.name: 0196 (414.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Let's just keep working at it for now.

data.name: 0197 (414.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Yes, let's keep at it.

data.name: 0198 (414.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Hmm, not here... Oh--! ...Looks like it's just a misprint...

data.name: 0199 (414.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Looks like she's really trying her hardest to find it.

data.name: 0200 (414.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I'll leave her to it.

data.name: 0202 (414.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Have you found anything?

data.name: 0204 (414.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Nagato gave a tiny sideways shake of the head.

data.name: 0205 (414.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I wonder if there even is such sheet music in this room.

data.name: 0206 (414.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: The sheet music Haruhi Suzumiya speaks of does not exist within this room.

data.name: 0207 (414.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Figures, huh.

data.name: 0208 (414.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Do you think there's one of those abnormal spaces?

data.name: 0209 (414.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: None have been generated at the present.

data.name: 0210 (414.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I see…

data.name: 0211 (414.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: In other words, this time it really was just a misunderstanding from the Computer Society.

data.name: 0212 (414.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Thanks, Nagato.

data.name: 0213 (414.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Just keep pretending to search or whatever and you're good.

data.name: 0215 (414.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Nagato...?

data.name: 0216 (414.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Pretending to search.

data.name: 0217 (414.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: R-right... Sorry for bothering you.

data.name: 0218 (414.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: It's fine.

data.name: 0219 (414.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Koizumi, how's it all going?

data.name: 0220 (414.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Unfortunately I'm yet to find a even a clue, let alone the sheet music.

data.name: 0221 (414.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Well, I'm not sure what else I expected.

data.name: 0222 (414.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It is just something Haruhi came up with on her own, after all.

data.name: 0223 (414.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Though, this is Miss Suzumiya we're dealing with.

data.name: 0224 (414.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: We cannot predict when she may give rise to any oddities.

data.name: 0225 (414.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: It's best to err on the side of caution, don't you agree?

data.name: 0226 (414.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Keeping an eye on Haruhi is all up to you then.

data.name: 0227 (414.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Such a topic as the supernatural is way too much for a normal human like me after all.

data.name: 0229 (414.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Koizumi, how's it going?

data.name: 0230 (414.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I suppose one would say "as usual" in a situation like this.

data.name: 0231 (414.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Right...

data.name: 0232 (414.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: If I find anything, I'll let you know right away, of course.

data.name: 0233 (414.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Ah, thanks a lot.

data.name: 0235 (414.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Hey, stop bothering Asahina.

data.name: 0236 (414.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: I'm not bothering her.

data.name: 0237 (414.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Oh really? Then be a good little sister and go home.

data.name: 0238 (414.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: Jeez, why won't you believe me, Kyon?

data.name: 0239 (414.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: As your brother who witnesses that conduct every day--I can't help it.

data.name: 0240 (414.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Either way, Asahina is busy at the moment.

data.name: 0241 (414.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: So don't be unreasonable.

data.name: 0242 (414.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: Okay...

data.name: 0243 (414.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: What are you doing?

data.name: 0244 (414.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: I'm helping Mikuru.

data.name: 0245 (414.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Wow, that's quite impressive.

data.name: 0246 (414.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: It is, so don't interrupt me.

data.name: 0247 (414.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Grr…

data.name: 0248 (414.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Now she's the one scolding me.

data.name: 0250 (414.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: So this is the only piano in the music room, huh.

data.name: 0251 (414.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Just looking at it, it seems perfectly normal. There's no way it'd play on its own.

data.name: 0252 (414.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Good grief, how absurd.

data.name: 0253 (414.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: As expected, there's nothing strange to be found on the piano.

data.name: 0255 (414.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: There's something written on one of the keys.

data.name: 0256 (414.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: "Do."

data.name: 0257 (414.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: …Who would've written this?

data.name: 0260 (414.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: About Haruhi
